    "name": "Primes of the form x^3+x^2+1, where x is a prime.",
    "comment": [
        "Only primes of the form 3k+2 can generate this series [only exception is a(2)=37, generated by x=3].",
        "No prime of this sequence can generate another term in this sequence because all terms of this sequence are 1 modulo 3."
    ],
    "example": [
        "a(12) = 7004353 = 191^3+191^2+1"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "Select[Table[x^3+x^2+1,{x,Prime[Range[200]]}],PrimeQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 31 2014 *)"
